verbose_text: Besides G2 and G1, Gt-Mamy also transglycosylates the products of acarbose hydrolysis onto other acceptor sugars and sugar alcohols like methyl-alpha-D-glucopyranoside (MG), mannitol, xylitol, xylose, rhamnose and sucrose.
evidence: G1, Gt-Mamy also transglycosylates the products of acarbose hydrolysis onto other acceptor sugars and sugar alcohols
